title: How many years ago is 500 BC? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, since it’s now 2018, it’s 2517 years ago I’d say. Some might think 2518 but not at least not the way I count it. You have to remember that there is no year between 1AD and 1BC. That means that if you go back to the year 1AD, that’s 2017 years ago. Then one more year would bring you to 1BC (remember, there was no year 0 (zero) so that would be 2018 years, to 2BC would be 2019 years and 498 more would bring you back to 500BC so that would be a total of 2517 years. Of course if you’re that old, one more year plus or minus isn’t going to make any difference anyway. <g> Tom

According to the Gregorian calendar that we’re going by right now, 500 B.C. would’ve been about 2,517 years ago as of December 9th, 2018. Not 2,518 because there is no ‘Year 0’ between 1 B.C. and 1 A.D.
